preferences.subtitle: Setup your preferences about skill and how you should receive the notifications about new tasks and projects
preferences.subtitle2: You can onboard accounts to receive payments using our supported countries or link your account with Paypal (that will include Paypal fees)

notifications.checkbox: I want to receive notifications about all the tasks, not just the ones I'm interested

welcome.tagline2: and receive bounty for your contributions

item.primary: Once subscribed you will know when new tasks are available to assign
item.secondary: Clients create demands and they are looking for contributors with different skills

two.primary: You are assigned and receive all the instructions need to start
two.secondary: You get access to repo info with all you need to start and discuss about possible solutions

three.primary: We validate your change, integrate the code and you receive a bounty
three.secondary: Your change goes to test and your solution will be reviewed and once integrated on the codebase, you receive a bounty

bottom.call:
A better way to build your project,
a better way to work in projects

pricing.title: Princing
pricing.description: Check our options to boost your company deliveries that can fit with your needs

item.secondary: The distributed colaboration helps company grows and provide a great solution to have the tasks solved using agile process and colaboration throught development

two.primary: Pay for your tasks concluded with a smart and automated development process
two.secondary: You will have different contributors, with wide experience that will help on the development using tools that they are confortable with established processes

one.primary: Manage the tasks of your projects
one.secondary: With our platform the companies are able to manage your tasks on demand with development tools that suits your needs

three.primary: Develop your business with open source tools, and pay on demand
three.secondary: Companies can use the Gitpay for all the development needs, from create a repository until release, paying for concluded and merged tasks that are integrated in your project for real

integration.desc: You can install our Gitpay app on your Github and start to boost your issues
integration.title: Integration
integration.subtitle: Check out our Github app

item.secondary: Clients, team leads, designers, content creators and managers, everyone can follow the progress and status using already known tools to manage their projects for remote teams

two.secondary: Beginners will learn for real of how contribute to real companies with real projects, experienced contributors can help with revisions and hard tasks, and is possible to choose projects and tasks that you want to grow or that you are familiar and confortable to work with

three.primary: Learn by doing and receive bounties
three.secondary: Work in different projects and create solutions with distributed teams around the world, using tools that you are familiar and propose solutions for issues that you know. You will be able to be assigned for new challenges

one.primary: Work in projects using the best development tools
one.secondary: We use all the Git tools and version control to manage deliveries for our clients

two.primary: Colaboration with companies by tasks on demand
two.secondary: Work in different projects, you can colaborate and learn with many projects and stacks

three.secondary: Receive bounties for the task you concluded with direct payment when your code is merged on the codebase

one.secondary: A new issue, demand, enhancement or suggestion is created on the platform, that represents needs like development, SEO, content, infrastructure or even new ideas

two.primary: Your demand is send to our community
two.secondary: Differents colaborators group will be interested to solve this issue for the price invested for that bounty

four.primary: Agile process between business, payment, consulting and development
four.secondary: We want to facilitate the transactions and payment between colaborators and companies by facilitate the development with smart tools, consolidated process already used in agile companies and emerging startups

three.primary: Sent a pull request to receive a bounty
three.secondary: A Pull Request is send in the repo and once approved the bounty is sent

two.primary: Work with smart integrations and tools
two.secondary: Focus on the task instead of worry about how you will deliver, using git tools and integration the delivery is more efficient

one.primary: Work with collaboration between members, maintainers and clients
one.secondary: Working with collaboration, you can help and support from a community

three.secondary: The open source allow us to work in descentralized and independent projects and we follow this path to provide our deliveries

item.secondary: The distributed colaboration helps company grows and provide a great solution to have the tasks solved using agile process and colaboration throught development

two.secondary: Companies will be able to use Open Source if they want to create colaborative tools that will help other companies and contribute with the OSS ecosystem

three.primary: We validate your business integration process
three.secondary: We will help to fit in agile process to have your tasks concluded in an independent way and according to your business
